era.game_crash_message:
The game crashed!

If you are using Heroes Launcher:
	- open the "Tools" tab
	- select "Debug Creator"

If you are NOT using Heroes Launcher:
	- open the folder [GAME_FOLDER]/Tools/Debug Creator/
	- run "Debug Creator.hta"

After running "Debug Creator.hta"
	- attach the save file
	- create a Debug Archive
	- go to the folder with the Debug archive
	- send it to the Discord channel "bugs-reports"

			Thank you!!!

user_notification.no_dat_settings:
{Attention, Player!}

The game did not detect the saved WoG-options settings specified in the WoG.ini file! This means that the "default" settings from the "zsetup01.txt" file will be applied.
To save your settings, open the WoG-options menu and click on the "Save" button.

If you click "Cancel", this message will no longer be shown.
